content:
VERIFICATION REPORT. ves version 3

Table 4 The baseline emissions of the Project

Emission Factor Baseline Period (tCO,e/MWh) Emission (tCO,e) H l=G*H 8,937.890 144,666.540 165,773 61,843.540 TOTAL 215,447.970 . 246,881

[Project emissions]

As per the methodology ACM0002 Version 9, for the windfarm project, the project emission is zero.

[Leakage emissions]

No leakage needs to be considered according to ACM0002 Version 9.

[Emission reductions]

Therefore, the emission reductions during the monitoring period from 02/12/2008-27/07/2010 are calculated as:

BE PE LE Emission Monitoring Period Vintage reductions tCO: tcO tcO ( 2@) ( 2@) ( 2e) (tCOze) 2008 10,242 0 0 10,242 02/12/2008- 165,773 165,773 27/07/2010 2009 0 0 2010 70,866 0 0 70,866 Total 246,881 0 0 246,881

As per ex-ante calculation of the registered CDM-PDD, the average of annual emission reductions is 155,384tCO2e. The estimated ERs during this period are 282,810 tCOze (=155,384*684/365), whereas the actual emission reduction accomplished by the project during this verification period is 246,881 tCOze. Comparing with the estimated ERs, the actual ERs were lower than estimation.
